price: 30. Hij zei: “Mijn Heer! Geef mij de overwinning over het volk dat uit verderfzaaiers bestaat."
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
